resources.string: Shyampur High School Puranapoil was one of them which is in a pleasant environment adorned with numerous plants, open and free from noise. This High was started with Science and Humanities in 1964. There are academic buildings, Workshop/Laboratory and the best educational facilities in this large institution of 6.5 acres of land. There are a commodious library enriched with 5500 books for earning knowledge, a mosque next to the entrance of the institution, a large auditorium for cultural studies and a large playground.

Shyampur High School Puranapoil was one of them which is in a pleasant environment adorned with numerous plants, open and free from noise. This High was started with Science and Humanities in 1964.
